Title: Introducing The Blazor Puzzle
Description: In the premiere episode, Carl Franklin and Jeff Fritz offer thier first challenge. What's wrong with this code?
Details: Start here. It's a simple Blazor WebAssembly app that seems to work just fine, but there's a problem in the code. Can you spot it? This project was written for .NET 7, but it would also be an issue for .NET 5, .NET 6, or .NET 8. It would also be an issue in a Blazor Server app. If you think you know the answer, watch episode 2 and see if you got it right!

Title: Got JavaScript?
Description: In this episode, Carl Franklin and Jeff Fritz show a solution where Blazor calls into JavaScript, and then JavaScript calls Blazor C# code after 5 seconds.
Details: Watch the video and, if necessary, check out the code at the GitHub repo. If you think you know the answer, watch episode 3 to see if you got it right!
